system.weapons: Cyclops Demolition Charge: (4d10+10 X, Pen 8, Blast(1d10+10), Concussive(5))
system.specialRules:
Traits: Enclosed, Extremely Volatile, Ponderous, Tracked Vehicle

Special Rules: Remote Controlled Little Boy! Controller uses 1kg device and requires Trained Tech-Use. Has operating range of 200m, reduced by 1m+ walls and bad weather. Split Actions between self and control device. Detonating requires Half Action (Attack/Concentration). Detonates if suffering Righteous Fury, If it explodes by any means, uses Demolition Charge Profile. Takes up space of ~5 Guardsman for transport purposes. max 1 on Valkyrie.
